name: Unveil (itch) (Klaatu)
description:
Unveil

Create a serene soundscape as you unveil colours and learn how to structure them for success.

This game was written for Open Jam 2020. The theme was Airborne.

Requirements
  • Python 3
  • Pygame
How do I run this game?

  1. Install Python 3 on Windows or Mac. Linux users already have it installed.

  2. Use Python to install the requirements:

    $ python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt

  3. Start the game:

    $ python3 ./main.py

Enjoy.
